fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: We follow EU initiatives, policies and legislative files related to our Pharmaceuticals and Vaccines businesses. This includes topics such as R&D and clinical trials, data protection, relevant legislation and initiatives, medical devices, trade & IP, environment.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Takeda is a member of European Federation of Pharmaceutical Industries and Associations (EFPIA) and Vaccines Europe (VE) 
 
Takeda is also member of EUCOPE (European Confederation of Pharmaceutical Enterpreneurs)
goals__remit: Takeda is a global pharmaceutical company that focuses on innovative medicines in gastroenterology, oncology, central nervous system, cardiovascular and metabolic, as well as vaccines. The portfolio of quality, established prescription and over-the-counter medicines helps patients around the world.  Takeda’s mature markets – Japan, United States and Europe – remain strong cornerstones of our business as we continue to grow our presence in emerging markets, such as Brazil, Russia and China. In Europe the company has a presence that covers 30 countries and commercial headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland.  To learn more please visit us at www.takeda.com
relevant_communication: Mainly via participation at events organised by Trade Associations (e.g. EFPIA).
